snippet: The Justice Department’s recent settlement with Ohio, which will eventually end solitary confinement there, puts all states on notice.
abstract: Editorial contends Justice Dept's settlement with Ohio, which will sharply reduce and eventually end solitary confinement for juvenile prisoners, puts other states on notice that such policies need to change; contends if settlement's principles are adopted nationally, they will go a long way toward humanizing juvenile detention.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department’s recent settlement with Ohio, which will eventually end solitary confinement there, puts all states on notice.

headline.main: A Model for Juvenile Detention Reform
headline.print_headline: A Model for Juvenile Detention Reform
